code: function time(t){var past=new Date(t);var current=new Date();var time=past.getDay();var hour=past.getHours();var minute=past.getMinutes();var year=past.getFullYear();var month=past.getMonth()+1;var day=past.getDate();var n_time=current.getDay();var n_hour=current.getHours();var n_minute=current.getMinutes();var n_year=current.getFullYear();var n_month=current.getMonth()+1;var n_day=past.getDate();if(day===n_day&&year===n_year&&month==n_month){if(hour<10){hour='0'+hour;}if(minute<10){minute='0'+minute;}return hour+':'+minute;}if(day+1===n_day&&year===n_year&&month==n_month){if(hour<10){hour='0'+hour;}if(minute<10){minute='0'+minute;}return'前天'+hour+':'+minute;}else{return year+'/'+month+'/'+day;}}export default time;
